item.title: IDEA 配置
item.description: 1、配置 方法间加分割线 File | Settings | Editor | General | Appearance | Show method separators 2、模板 类模板 File | Settings | Editor | File and Code Templates | File Header /** * @Classname ${NAME} * @Description TODO * @Date ${DATE} ${TIME} * @Created by ${USER} */ 方法模板 File | Settings | Editor |
